Class Promotions.PromotionStats

java.lang.Object
com.lancaster.database.Promotions.PromotionStats
Enclosing class:
Promotions
public static class Promotions.PromotionStats extends Object
Inner class containing statistics about promotion performance. This class provides analytical data about how a promotion has performed, including usage counts, total discount amounts, and conversion rates.
Since:
2025-04-07

  • Constructor Details

    • PromotionStats

      public PromotionStats()
      Constructs a new PromotionStats instance with default values.

    • PromotionStats

      public PromotionStats(int promotionId, int usageCount, double totalDiscountAmount, double conversionRate, LocalDateTime lastUpdated)
      Constructs a new PromotionStats with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      promotionId - The promotion ID to which these statistics apply
      usageCount - The total number of times this promotion has been applied
      totalDiscountAmount - The total discount amount applied through this promotion
      conversionRate - The percentage of customers who used the promotion when eligible
      lastUpdated - Last updated timestamp for these statistics

  • Method Details

    • getAverageDiscountPerUse

      public double getAverageDiscountPerUse()
      Calculates the average discount per use.
      Returns:
      The average discount amount per use, or 0 if the promotion has not been used

    • addUsage

      public void addUsage(double discountAmount)
      Updates the statistics with new usage data.
      Parameters:
      discountAmount - The discount amount from a new promotion application
